title: Skin Troll??
body: I was in queue for a normal match then I was just pressing on random champions, I pressed on Illaoi and in the chat it said "Voidbringer Illaoi can be used in this game" or something like that. I was surprised so I told my friend in my Skype call that it said this and he was gonna play Illaoi since i duo with him bot. He tried to use the skin but it didn't let him. (I played Lucian). Later after that I forgot about it and when I was gonna play a 1v1 with my other friend (1v1 Yasuo, First death) its came up with "Highnoon yasuo can be used in this game" so I locked him in and I went to the skin but it didn't let me use it I already had project and blood moon. So I was like is this a troll or a bug. Thank you please someone reply and tell me why ahaha.

replies.body: I don't know about you but I got this happening in games after aram games that had been skin boosted. Maybe it's a bug around that?
